name: Empty World (tkellaway)
description:
Made for Trijam #153 - 3 Hour Game Jam (Theme: Empty World).

Go into the world and empty it of things with a jetpack and a gun. Dirt can be shot and destroyed, but some objects need to be yeeted into space. Once all objects are gone, the timer stops and you win.

Use A + D to move Left/Right

Hold Spacebar to activate the jetpack

Aim the cursor and hold the left mouse button to shoot.

Took 6 hours to make as I got stuck on some programming early on. Didn't have time to improve player animations or add in a second weapon, but I think it went okay for my first jam attempt. The prototype was ready in 2.25 hours but I didn't want to upload without art and sound.
